eduExp.major: Traditional Chinese Medicine (molecular biology) Postgraduate (Master's Degree)

selfComm:
Professional competence: 8 years of study in the professional field and 
obtained bachelor and master degree, 5 years of sales experience in reagents 
and instruments, good at market development and new business development. 
Training ability: good at analyzing and studying sales skills, willing to share 
with other colleagues, explain professional knowledge and sales points to all 
agent teams in person. Team coordination: as an excellent team leader to 
coordinate the regional division and business contacts between different agents 
in the region, and achieve the goals together. Personality: I am optimistic, 
positive, active, self-disciplined and good at establishing and maintaining 
interpersonal relationships quickly.

workExp.detail:
- 所在地区：Xi'an 
 - 下属人数：0人 
 - 职责业绩： 
 Responsibilities: responsible for reagent channel sales in Northwest China, 
Sichuan, Chongqing and Henan, as well as follow-up the project of enterprises 
and public institutions.
 reagent business development:
 The reagent sales volume in northwest China reached ¥400,000 increased 300% 
year on year.
 Sichuan and Chongqing new reagent customers have achieved sales volume of 
¥400,000 .
 In Henan, I have completed the first order of 50 kits from Henan Animal 
Husbandry since I took over the project in October 2018.
 development and follow-up with Zhengzhou Boao Biotechnology Co., Ltd., Jinyu 
Medical Inspection Group, Shaanxi Baimei Gene and other third party inspection 
institutions.
 Agent development: from 0 to 1, develop agency channels, 5 agents in 
northwest China, 2 agents in Sichuan and Chongqing, and 3 agents in henna, with 
a total contract order quantity of 2.2 million.
 market development:
 Made a strange visit, communicated with the department teachers about the 
current project, and mastered the progress and results of projects.
 Recommends reagent projects, relevant scientific research and technical 
programs and application results.
 Provide sample sack, technical training and operation demonstration.
 Further communication with the head of the department about the use and 
method of reagent research so as to obtain technical approval.
 Project training: responsible for reagent technical training, market guidance 
and business cooperation negotiation for commercial agents.
 System sorting: established the price system for each agent, established the 
official discount setting, and ensure that agents in the region have no 
malicious bidding and conflicts.
 Information Record: product sales license, registration certificate, business 
license and other qualifications shall be provided to the hospital for record; 
Collect and input related information of hospitals for reagent order.
 organization of conference:
 organized the industry exchange meeting "northwest life science industry 
instrument and reagent exchange meeting", invited 6 technical experts from 
different manufacturers to give speeches, and nearly 100 relevant personnel 
from manufacturers and dealers of the same industry attended the meeting.
 Organized 6 outdoor touring exhibitions in southwest and northwest China 
connected with the scientific research of universities to publicize and promote 
the company's brand image.
 activity planning: conference process design, venue rental, host arrangement, 
electronic invitation card design, check-in guidance and prize setting, etc

- 所在地区：Shanxi 
 - 下属人数：0人 
 - 职责业绩： 
 Sales performance: completed the sales of 10 instruments, with nearly 
¥800,000 sales volume; Reagent sales increased by 1 million.
 customer relations:
 maintained the company's existing customer relations and developed new 
customers with the introduction of surrounding relationships.
 visited new customers and expanded the 4 new customers in the area, including 
the First Affiliated Hospital of Xi 'An Jiaotong University, The Second 
Affiliated Hospital of Xi 'An Jiaotong University, Shaanxi People's Hospital, 
Xi 'An Red Cross Hospital, Xi 'An Jiaotong University and Its Affiliated 
Medical Department.
 Balance payment collection: 10% quality guarantee deposit of the instrument 
was paid in one year, and ensures the payment collection rate in three months 
will be within the normal range of 60-80%.
 Bidding control: customer negotiation and communication, preparation of 
materials, analysis and confirmation of prices, whole process promotion and 
control of the company's bidding projects, and coordination of bidding and 
related work in the region.
 Supplier maintenance: maintain good relationship with R&D, production, 
procurement and after-sales departments of the company, ensure timely and 
accurate order placing, delivery, installation, training and after-sales 
service according to customer order requirements.
